entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -20.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 03:37 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -20.9°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: ESE 46 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Blizzard developing overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
